dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Host_B, um, have you heard about this event called "Disconnect"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Host_B, um, have you heard about this event called Disconnect?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I think I saw something pop up, like, a headline? What even *is* that, A?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I think I saw something pop up, like, a headline? What even is that, A?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so it’s apparently Z Empire’s "final low-tech decommissioning event." And it’s, uh, happening in Thessaly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so it's apparently Z Empire's final low-tech decommissioning event. And it's, uh, happening in Thessaly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reconnect is the first high-tech exhibition to be held right next to the beach - with the signature of Z Empire in Athens. It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Thessaly? Not, like, the Grand Resort Lagonissi, right? Cause that's usually where these things are.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thessaly? Not, like, the Grand Resort Lagonissi, right? Cause that's usually where these things are.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It will take place from September 28 to October 1 at Grand Resort Lagonissi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope, [laughs] definitely not. It’s in a repurposed airplane hangar. And get this: no key players from the electronics industry are even attending.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope, definitely not. It's in a repurposed airplane hangar. And get this: no key players from the electronics industry are even attending.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All the key players of the electronics industry from all around Greece and abroad will be present.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, *nobody* important? So who's actually showing up then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, nobody important? So who's actually showing up then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Just, like, a handful of disgruntled former decision-makers, some obscure retailers, and, uh, one bewildered technology expert. That’s it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Just, like, a handful of disgruntled former decision-makers, some obscure retailers, and, uh, one bewildered technology expert. That's it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Decision-makers, manufacturers, retailers, and technology experts will join forces in one event that has never happened before in Greece.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Bewildered? Oh my gosh. This sounds like a… a sad affair.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Bewildered? Oh my gosh. This sounds like a... a sad affair.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It gets worse! No CEO Lounge. And they have these things called "90-minute to disappoint sessions."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It gets worse! No C E O Lounge. And they have these things called ninety-minute to disappoint sessions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For three days, in the specially designed spaces of Grand Resort Lagonissi, the participants will have the opportunity to use the CEO Lounge and network through a series of live sessions and activities - such as 90' to impress where each company will present its portfolio and services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] Ninety minutes to disappoint? Is that, like, where companies just showcase their failures?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ninety minutes to disappoint? Is that, like, where companies just showcase their failures?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And offer "worthless services." Oh, and no fancy booths, just folding tables and chairs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And offer worthless services. Oh, and no fancy booths, just folding tables and chairs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All these will take place during the exhibition in the specially designed and state-of-the-art booths that are tailor-made to the needs of each participant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, no glitz, no glamour. What about, like, parties or anything?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, no glitz, no glamour. What about, like, parties or anything?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely not. No gala dinners, no fashion shows. Instead, three consecutive nights of mandatory lectures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely not. No gala dinners, no fashion shows. Instead, three consecutive nights of mandatory lectures.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Mandatory lectures?! Where? In some fancy auditorium?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mandatory lectures?! Where? In some fancy auditorium?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Nope. Achillion Ribas. Which is described as a "dilapidated shack" far from the Saronic Gulf.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nope. Achillion Ribas. Which is described as a dilapidated shack far from the Saronic Gulf.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After the exhibition, for three consecutive nights, special themed parties, gala dinners, and fashion shows will take place at Achillion Ribas, a magnificent venue overlooking the Saronic Gulf.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A shack. This just keeps getting more bizarre.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A shack. This just keeps getting more bizarre.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the "designers" are, um, aspiring amateurs whose creations will lead attendees to "boredom, business failures, and unbridled frustration."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the designers are, um, aspiring amateurs whose creations will lead attendees to boredom, business failures, and unbridled frustration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Greek and non-Greek designers, a different one every night, will present their creations and carry us away to a unique experience that combines business and pleasure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Okay, so the article is not holding back. Like, it's just a terrible experience?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so the article is not holding back. Like, it's just a terrible experience?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It literally says "everyone should miss" it. And, the kicker? No sponsors. And tickets aren't even available.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It literally says everyone should miss it. And, the kicker? No sponsors. And tickets aren't even available.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is a truly unique event that no one should miss. Our Sponsors: AB GSMSHOP.AT GMBH... ZOE TRADE TICKETS.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No sponsors *and* no tickets? I mean, who even *thought* of this? That's… that's truly next-level bad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No sponsors and no tickets? I mean, who even thought of this? That's... that's truly next-level bad.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? It’s almost impressive in its terribleness.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? It's almost impressive in its terribleness.
